entry.title: Friday: Chance of flurries. High minus 8. POP 30%
entry.summary: Sunny. Increasing cloudiness near noon then 30 percent chance of flurries this afternoon. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 8. Wind chill minus 28 this morning and minus 13 this afternoon. Risk of frostbite. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:30 AM EST Friday 06 January 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 22. POP 30%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 30 percent chance of flurries early this evening. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 22. Wind chill minus 14 this evening and minus 25 overnight. Forecast issued 05:30 AM EST Friday 06 January 2023
